                                                   .setParameter("perspective", dashboard)
          
          
            
                                                   .setParameter(PERSPECTIVE_PARAM, dashboard)
Why did you stop using PERSPECTIVE_PARAM here?
I was working to replace perspective param to use dashboard instead, however, I changed to support both params, but I forgot to replace in some parts!
Looks like this import can be removed.

I also changed this class to use the helper I created later.
This code is very old, it was a small unplanned feature that waited until main features were implemented to be added. When I first created this button there was no helper or multi mode, hence I had to change!
